name: Training driving cars
short_description:
Car driving is not just to have a driver's license plate , driving also to have a steady hand drive , and driving safety . You can have a driver's license plate , which is not difficult . But the driver of the motor vehicle or not , there is a steering wheel firmly and safely in traffic or not is another story . Please put your safety in traffic and above all , because of traffic safety is everyone's happy home . Find a car driving course really quality and prestige .

What is B2 driving license ? ( B1 B2 and C how different )
By driving licenses B2 is the most popular driving current regulations under 9 control car seat not transport business . In theory driving school in B2 can control most popular passenger cars , family cars , car bodies 4 seats , 5 seats , 7 seats .
